javascript:%22use%20strict%22%3B(()%3D%3E%7Bvar%20R%3Dclass%7BgetCurrentThreadTime(e%2Ct)%7Blet%20r%3DMath.max(0%2Ct-e.executionStartMs)*e.speedMultiplier%3Bif(e.baselineThreadTime)return%20new%20Date(e.baselineThreadTime.getTime()%2Br)%3Blet%20i%3De.threadStartTime.getTime()%2Br%3Breturn%20new%20Date(i)%7DfindPreviousResponse(e%2Ct)%7Bif(e.length%3D%3D%3D0)return%20null%3Blet%20n%3Dt.getTime()%2Cr%3D%5B...e%5D.sort((l%2Cu)%3D%3E%7Blet%20d%3Dl.timestamp.getTime()-u.timestamp.getTime()%3Breturn%20d!%3D%3D0%3Fd%3Al.index-u.index%7D)%2Ci%3D0%2Co%3Dr.length-1%2Ca%3D-1%3Bfor(%3Bi%3C%3Do%3B)%7Blet%20l%3DMath.floor((i%2Bo)%2F2)%3Br%5Bl%5D.timestamp.getTime()%3C%3Dn%3F(a%3Dl%2Ci%3Dl%2B1)%3Ao%3Dl-1%7Dreturn%20a%3D%3D%3D-1%3Fnull%3Ar%5Ba%5D%7D%7D%3Bvar%20ie%3D%2F%5E(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%5C%2F(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%5C%2F(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%5C((.)%5C)(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%3A(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%3A(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%24%2F%2Coe%3D%2F%5E(%5Cd%7B4%7D)%5C%2F(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%5C%2F(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%20(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%3A(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%3A(%5Cd%7B2%7D)%24%2F%2Cae%3D%5B%22%E6%97%A5%22%2C%22%E6%9C%88%22%2C%22%E7%81%AB%22%2C%22%E6%B0%B4%22%2C%22%E6%9C%A8%22%2C%22%E9%87%91%22%2C%22%E5%9C%9F%22%5D%3Bfunction%20x(s%2Ce%3D%7B%7D)%7Blet%20t%3Ds.trim()%2Cn%3Dt.match(ie)%3Bif(n)%7Blet%5B%2Ci%2Co%2Ca%2Cl%2Cu%2Cd%2Cm%5D%3Dn%2Cf%3D2e3%2BNumber.parseInt(i%2C10)%3Breturn%20V(f%2CNumber.parseInt(o%2C10)-1%2CNumber.parseInt(a%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(u%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(d%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(m%2C10)%2Ce.skipWeekdayCheck%3Fnull%3Al)%7Dlet%20r%3Dt.match(oe)%3Bif(r)%7Blet%5B%2Ci%2Co%2Ca%2Cl%2Cu%2Cd%5D%3Dr%3Breturn%20V(Number.parseInt(i%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(o%2C10)-1%2CNumber.parseInt(a%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(l%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(u%2C10)%2CNumber.parseInt(d%2C10))%7Dreturn%20null%7Dfunction%20V(s%2Ce%2Ct%2Cn%2Cr%2Ci%2Co%3Dnull)%7Bif(Number.isNaN(s)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(e)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(t)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(n)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(r)%7C%7CNumber.isNaN(i))return%20null%3Blet%20a%3Dnew%20Date(s%2Ce%2Ct%2Cn%2Cr%2Ci%2C0)%3Breturn%20a.getFullYear()!%3 %86%E3%83%8A%E3%81%8C%E8%A6%8B%E3%81%A4%E3%81%8B%E3%82%8A%E3%81%BE%E3%81%9B%E3%82%93%22)%2C%5B%5D%3Blet%20t%3DT(e)%2Cn%3D%5B%5D%3Breturn%20t.forEach((r%2Ci)%3D%3E%7Blet%20o%3Dp(r%2C%22.cnw%22)%3F.textContent%2Ca%3Do%3Fpe(o)%3Anull%3Bif(!a)%7Bconsole.warn(%60%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%23%24%7Bi%2B1%7D%3A%20%E3%82%BF%E3%82%A4%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%83%B3%E3%83%97%E3%81%8C%E7%A9%BA%E3%81%A7%E3%81%99%60)%3Breturn%7Dlet%20l%3Dx(a)%3Bif(!l)%7Bconsole.warn(%60%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%23%24%7Bi%2B1%7D%3A%20%E3%82%BF%E3%82%A4%E3%83%A0%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%83%B3%E3%83%97%E8%A7%A3%E6%9E%90%E3%81%AB%E5%A4%B1%E6%95%97%3A%20%22%24%7Ba%7D%22%60)%3Breturn%7Dlet%20u%3Due(r)%3Bif(!u)%7Bconsole.warn(%60%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%23%24%7Bi%2B1%7D%3A%20%E3%82%A2%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AB%E3%83%BC%E8%A6%81%E7%B4%A0%E3%81%8C%E8%A6%8B%E3%81%A4%E3%81%8B%E3%82%8A%E3%81%BE%E3%81%9B%E3%82%93%60)%3Breturn%7Dn.push(%7Btimestamp%3Al%2Celement%3Au%2Cindex%3Ai%2B1%2CcontentHash%3Ade(r%2Cl%2Cu)%2CallNodes%3Ar%7D)%7D)%2Cn%7Dfunction%20ue(s)%7Bfor(let%20t%20of%20s)if(t.nodeType%3D%3D%3DNode.ELEMENT_NODE)return%20t%3Blet%20e%3Dp(s%2C%22.cnw%2C%20.cno%22)%3Breturn%20e%7C%7Cnull%7Dfunction%20de(s%2Ce%2Ct)%7Bif(s.length%3D%3D%3D1%26%26s%5B0%5Dinstanceof%20HTMLElement)return%20U(t%2Ce)%3Blet%20n%3Dce(s)%2Cr%3De.toISOString()%3Breturn%20O(%60%24%7Br%7D%3A%24%7Bn%7D%60)%7Dfunction%20ce(s)%7Breturn%20s.map(t%3D%3Et.textContent%3F%3F%22%22).join(%22%7C%22).slice(0%2C200)%7Dfunction%20pe(s)%7Blet%20e%3Ds.trim()%3Breturn%20e.includes(%22ID%3A%22)%3Fe.split(%22ID%3A%22)%5B0%5D.trim()%3Ae%7Dvar%20me%3D1e4%2Che%3D5%2CI%3Dclass%7Bconstructor(e%3D%7B%7D)%7Bthis.intervalId%3Dnull%3Bthis.currentResponses%3D%5B%5D%3Bthis.options%3D%7BintervalMs%3Ae.intervalMs%3F%3Fme%2ConResponsesAdded%3Ae.onResponsesAdded%3F%3F(()%3D%3E%7B%7D)%2ConError%3Ae.onError%3F%3F(t%3D%3Econsole.error(t))%7D%7Dstart()%7Bif(this.intervalId!%3D%3Dnull)%7Bconsole.warn(%22ResponseUpdateManager%20is%20already%20running%22)%3Breturn%7Dtry%7Bthis.currentResponses%3DM()%7Dcat B%5D%2B)%2Fi)%3F.%5B1%5D%3F%3Fnull%3Bif(t)return%20q(t)%3Blet%20n%3DMath.min(s.byteLength%2C4096)%2Cr%3Dnew%20TextDecoder(%22utf-8%22%2C%7Bfatal%3A!1%7D).decode(new%20Uint8Array(s%2C0%2Cn))%2Ci%3Dfe(r)%3Breturn%20i%3Fq(i)%3A%22utf-8%22%7Dasync%20function%20z(s)%7Blet%20e%3Dawait%20fetch(s)%3Bif(!e.ok)throw%20new%20Error(%60%E3%82%B9%E3%83%AC%E3%83%83%E3%83%89%20%24%7Bs%7D%20%E3%82%92%E5%8F%96%E5%BE%97%E3%81%A7%E3%81%8D%E3%81%BE%E3%81%9B%E3%82%93%E3%81%A7%E3%81%97%E3%81%9F%20(status%3A%20%24%7Be.status%7D)%60)%3Blet%20t%3Dawait%20e.arrayBuffer()%2Cn%3Dye(t%2Ce.headers.get(%22content-type%22))%2Cr%3Btry%7Br%3Dnew%20TextDecoder(n).decode(t)%7Dcatch%7Br%3Dnew%20TextDecoder(%22utf-8%22).decode(t)%7Dreturn%20new%20DOMParser().parseFromString(r%2C%22text%2Fhtml%22)%7Dfunction%20Y(s)%7Breturn(s.querySelector(%22title%22)%3F.textContent%3F%3F%22%22).toLowerCase().includes(%22futafuta%22)%3F%22futafuta%22%3AArray.from(s.querySelectorAll(%22script%5Bsrc%5D%22)).some(i%3D%3Ei.getAttribute(%22src%22)%3F.includes(%22tsumanne.net%22))%7C%7CArray.from(s.querySelectorAll(%22.cnw%22)).some(i%3D%3Ei.textContent%3F.includes(%22ID%3A%22))%3F%22tsumanne%22%3As.querySelector(%22.thre%20%3E%20div%20%3E%20table%22)%3F%22futaclo%22%3A%22futaba%22%7Dfunction%20G(s%2Ce)%7Bswitch(e)%7Bcase%22futaba%22%3Areturn%20Te(s)%3Bcase%22futaclo%22%3Areturn%20ge(s)%3Bcase%22tsumanne%22%3Areturn%20Ee(s)%3Bcase%22futafuta%22%3Areturn%20ve(s)%3Bdefault%3Areturn%5B%5D%7D%7Dfunction%20Te(s)%7Blet%20e%3Ds.querySelector(%22.thre%22)%3Breturn%20e%3FT(e).map(n%3D%3Eb(n))%3A%5B%5D%7Dfunction%20ge(s)%7Blet%20e%3Ds.querySelector(%22.thre%22)%3Breturn%20e%3FT(e).map(n%3D%3Eb(n))%3A%5B%5D%7Dfunction%20Ee(s)%7Blet%20e%3Ds.querySelector(%22.thre%22)%3Breturn%20e%3FT(e).filter(r%3D%3E%7Blet%20i%3Dr.find(o%3D%3Eo%20instanceof%20HTMLElement%26%26o.tagName%3D%3D%3D%22TABLE%22)%3Breturn!(i%20instanceof%20HTMLElement%26%26i.classList.contains(%22deleted%22))%7D).map(r%3D%3E%7Blet%20i%3Db(r)%3Breturn%20i.forEach(o%3D%3E%7Bo%20i j(a.nodes%2Cu%2C!0)%3Breturn%7Di%2B%3D1%2Cj(a.nodes%2Ci)%7D)%3Blet%20o%3Dr.flatMap(a%3D%3Ea.nodes)%3Be.replaceChildren(...o)%7Dfunction%20W(s)%7Blet%20n%3D(p(s%2C%22.cno%22)%3F.textContent%3F%3F%22%22).match(%2FNo%5C.(%5Cd%2B)%2F)%3Bif(!n)return%20null%3Blet%20r%3DNumber.parseInt(n%5B1%5D%2C10)%3Breturn%20Number.isNaN(r)%3Fnull%3Ar%7Dfunction%20Me(s)%7Blet%20e%3Dp(s%2C%22.res_no%22)%3Bif(!e)return%20null%3Blet%20t%3De.textContent%3F%3F%22%22%2Cn%3DNumber.parseInt(t%2C10)%3Breturn%20Number.isNaN(n)%3Fnull%3An%7Dfunction%20Re(s)%7Blet%20e%3Dp(s%2C%22.rsc%22)%3Bif(!e)return%20null%3Blet%20t%3De.textContent%3F%3F%22%22%2Cn%3DNumber.parseInt(t%2C10)%3Breturn%20Number.isNaN(n)%3Fnull%3An%7Dfunction%20j(s%2Ce%2Ct%3D!1)%7Blet%20n%3Ddocument.createElement(%22span%22)%3Bn.className%3D%22res_no%22%2Cn.textContent%3DString(e)%2Ct%26%26(n.style.display%3D%22none%22)%3Blet%20r%3Dp(s%2C%22.rtd%22)%3Bif(r)%7Br.insertBefore(n%2Cr.firstChild)%3Breturn%7Dlet%20i%3Dp(s%2C%22.cnw%22)%3F%3Fp(s%2C%22.cno%22)%3Bif(i%26%26i.parentElement)%7Bi.parentElement.insertBefore(n%2Ci)%3Breturn%7Dif(s.length%3E0%26%26s%5B0%5Dinstanceof%20Element)%7Bs%5B0%5D.insertBefore(n%2Cs%5B0%5D.firstChild)%3Breturn%7Dif(s.length%3E0%26%26s%5B0%5D.nodeType%3D%3D%3DNode.TEXT_NODE)%7Bs.splice(1%2C0%2Cn)%3Breturn%7Ds.unshift(n)%7Dfunction%20L(s%2Ce)%7Bif(s.startMode%3D%3D%3D%22index%22)%7Blet%20r%3Ds.startResponseIndex%3Bif(!Number.isInteger(r)%7C%7Cr%3C1)return%20g(%7Btype%3A%22index_out_of_range%22%2Cmessage%3A%60%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%E7%95%AA%E5%8F%B7%E3%81%8C%E7%AF%84%E5%9B%B2%E5%A4%96%E3%81%A7%E3%81%99%EF%BC%881%E3%80%9C%24%7Be.length%7D%EF%BC%89%60%2CvalidRange%3A%7Bmin%3Ae.length%3E0%3F1%3A0%2Cmax%3Ae.length%7D%7D)%3Blet%20i%3De.find(a%3D%3E%7Blet%20l%3DIe(a)%3Breturn%20l!%3D%3Dnull%26%26l%3D%3D%3Dr%7D)%3Bif(i)return%20w(i.timestamp)%3Bif(r%3Ee.length)return%20g(%7Btype%3A%22index_out_of_range%22%2Cmessage%3A%60%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%E7%95%AA%E5%8F%B7%E3%81%8C%E7%AF%84%E5%9B%B2%E5%A4%96%E3%81%A7%E3%81%99%EF%BC%881%E ent%3F.trim()%3Bif(e)return%20e%3Bif(!s.allNodes)return%20null%3Bfor(let%20t%20of%20s.allNodes)if(t.nodeType%3D%3D%3DNode.ELEMENT_NODE)%7Blet%20n%3Dt%3Bif(n.classList.contains(%22cno%22))return%20n.textContent%3F.trim()%3F%3Fnull%3Blet%20r%3Dn.querySelector(%22.cno%22)%3Bif(r%3F.textContent)return%20r.textContent.trim()%7Dreturn%20null%7Dfunction%20X(s)%7Bif(typeof%20s%3D%3D%22number%22)return%20Number.isInteger(s)%3Fs%3Anull%3Blet%20e%3Ds.trim().match(%2FNo%5C.(%5Cd%2B)%2F)%3Bif(!e)return%20null%3Blet%20t%3DNumber.parseInt(e%5B1%5D%2C10)%3Breturn%20Number.isNaN(t)%3Fnull%3At%7Dfunction%20Ie(s)%7Blet%20e%3Ds.element.querySelector(%22.res_no%22)%3F.textContent%3F.trim()%2Ct%3De%3FNumber.parseInt(e%2C10)%3ANaN%3Bif(!Number.isNaN(t))return%20t%3Bif(s.allNodes)%7Bfor(let%20n%20of%20s.allNodes)if(n%20instanceof%20HTMLElement)%7Blet%20r%3Dn.querySelector(%22.res_no%22)%3Bif(r%3F.textContent)%7Blet%20i%3DNumber.parseInt(r.textContent.trim()%2C10)%3Bif(!Number.isNaN(i))return%20i%7D%7D%7Dreturn%20null%7Dfunction%20w(s)%7Breturn%7Bsuccess%3A!0%2Cvalue%3As%7D%7Dfunction%20g(s)%7Breturn%7Bsuccess%3A!1%2Cerror%3As%7D%7Dfunction%20C(s)%7Breturn%7Bsuccess%3A!1%2Cerror%3As%7D%7Dfunction%20Z(s)%7Breturn%7Bsuccess%3A!0%2Cvalue%3As%7D%7Dfunction%20J(s)%7Breturn%20Number.isFinite(s)%3Fs%3C%3D0%3FC(%7Bcode%3A%22SPEED_MULTIPLIER_NON_POSITIVE%22%2Cmessage%3A%22%E5%86%8D%E7%94%9F%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%E3%81%AF0%E3%82%88%E3%82%8A%E5%A4%A7%E3%81%8D%E3%81%84%E6%95%B0%E5%80%A4%E3%81%A7%E6%8C%87%E5%AE%9A%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%22%2Cinput%3As%7D)%3AZ(s)%3AC(%7Bcode%3A%22SPEED_MULTIPLIER_NOT_FINITE%22%2Cmessage%3A%22%E5%86%8D%E7%94%9F%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%E3%81%AF%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E3%81%AE%E6%95%B0%E5%80%A4%E3%81%A7%E6%8C%87%E5%AE%9A%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%22%2Cinput%3As%7D)%7Dfunction%20Q(s)%7Blet%20e%3Ds.trim()%3Btry%7Blet%20t%3Dnew%20URL(e)%3Breturn%20t.protocol!%3D%3D%22http%3A%22%26%26t.protocol!%3D%3D%22https%3A%22%3FC(%7Bcode%3A%22URL_INVALID_FORMAT%22%2Cmessage%3A%22URL%E3%81%AF%20http%20%E3%81%BE%E3%81%9F%E3%81%AF%20https%20%E3%81%A7%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%22%2Cinput%3As%7D)%3AZ(t.toString())%7Dcatch%7Breturn%20C(%7Bcode%3A%22URL_INVALID_FORMAT%22%2Cmessage%3A%22%E6%9C%89%E5%8A%B9%E3%81%AAURL%E3%82%92%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%22%2Cinput%3As%7D)%7D%7Dvar%20we%3D1e4%2CLe%3D%22420px%22%2CE%3D%221px%20solid%20%23444%22%2CD%3Dclass%7Bconstructor()%7Bthis.container%3Dnull%3Bthis.resolveFn%3Dnull%3Bthis.lastSettings%3Dnull%7Dasync%20prompt(e)%7Be()%3Blet%20t%3Dthis.lastSettings%3F%3Fthis.getDefaultSettings()%3Breturn%20this.render(t)%7Dasync%20showWithError(e%2Ct%2Cn)%7Breturn%20this.render(e%2C%7Bmessage%3At%2Cfield%3An%7D)%7Ddestroy()%7Bthis.container%26%26(this.container.remove()%2Cthis.container%3Dnull)%2Cthis.resolveFn%3Dnull%7Dasync%20render(e%2Ct)%7Bif(this.destroy()%2C!document.body)return%20null%3Bthis.lastSettings%3De%3Blet%7Boverlay%3An%2Cform%3Ar%2CerrorBox%3Ai%7D%3Dthis.createOverlay(e)%3Breturn%20document.body.appendChild(n)%2Ct%26%26this.showError(r%2Ci%2Ct.message%2Ct.field)%2Cnew%20Promise(o%3D%3E%7Bthis.resolveFn%3Do%7D)%7DgetDefaultSettings()%7Breturn%7BstartMode%3A%22index%22%2CstartValue%3A1%2CstartResponseIndex%3A1%2CspeedMultiplier%3A1%2CadditionalThreadUrls%3A%5B%5D%7D%7DcreateOverlay(e)%7Blet%20t%3Ddocument.createElement(%22div%22)%3Bt.dataset.role%3D%22input-form-overlay%22%2Ct.style.position%3D%22fixed%22%2Ct.style.top%3D%220%22%2Ct.style.left%3D%220%22%2Ct.style.width%3D%22100%25%22%2Ct.style.height%3D%22100%25%22%2Ct.style.background%3D%22rgba(0%2C%200%2C%200%2C%200.6)%22%2Ct.style.display%3D%22flex%22%2Ct.style.alignItems%3D%22center%22%2Ct.style.justifyContent%3D%22center%22%2Ct.style.zIndex%3DString(we)%3Blet%20n%3Ddocument.createElement(%22div%22)%3Bn.dataset.role%3D%22input-form-card%22%2Cn.style.background%3D%22%23222%22%2Cn.style.colo %3E%5Bo.index%2Co%5D))%2Cthis.speedMultiplier%3Dt.speedMultiplier%2Cthis.lastResponseTimestamp%3Dthis.getLastResponseTimestamp()%7Dstart(e%3D%7B%7D)%7Bthis.intervalId!%3D%3Dnull%26%26this.stop()%3Blet%20t%3De.startTime%3F%7Bsuccess%3A!0%2Cvalue%3Ae.startTime%7D%3AL(this.settings%2Cthis.responses)%3Bif(!t.success)%7Bconsole.error(t.error.message)%2Cthis.onError%3F.(t.error.message)%3Breturn%7Dthis.startThreadTime%3Dt.value%2Cthis.currentThreadTime%3Dt.value%2Cthis.executionStartMs%3De.startPaused%3Fnull%3ADate.now()%2Cthis.baselineThreadTime%3Dnull%2Cthis.speedMultiplier%3Dthis.settings.speedMultiplier%2Cthis.hasScrolledInitial%3D!1%2Cthis.timelineEnded%3D!1%2Cthis.playbackState%3De.startPaused%3F%22PAUSED%22%3A%22PLAYING%22%2Cthis.updateStatusOverlay(!0)%2Ce.startPaused%26%26this.statusOverlay.showMessage(%22%E6%BA%96%E5%82%99%E5%AE%8C%E4%BA%86%E3%80%81x%E3%82%AD%E3%83%BC%E3%81%A7%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AD%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E9%96%8B%E5%A7%8B%22)%2Cthis.lastResponseTimestamp%3Dthis.getLastResponseTimestamp()%2Cthis.tick()%2Cthis.intervalId%3Dwindow.setInterval(()%3D%3Ethis.tick()%2CPe)%2Cthis.bindKeyboard()%7Dstop()%7Bthis.intervalId!%3D%3Dnull%26%26(window.clearInterval(this.intervalId)%2Cthis.intervalId%3Dnull)%2Cthis.executionStartMs%3Dnull%2Cthis.baselineThreadTime%3Dnull%2Cthis.unbindKeyboard()%2Cthis.speedOverlay.destroy()%2Cthis.statusOverlay.destroy()%2Cthis.playbackState%3D%22STOPPED%22%2Cthis.currentThreadTime%3Dnull%2Cthis.startThreadTime%3Dnull%2Cthis.hasScrolledInitial%3D!1%2Cthis.timelineEnded%3D!1%7DisRunning()%7Breturn%20this.playbackState!%3D%3D%22STOPPED%22%26%26!this.timelineEnded%7Dtick()%7Bif(!this.startThreadTime)return%3Bif(this.playbackState!%3D%3D%22PAUSED%22%26%26this.executionStartMs!%3D%3Dnull)%7Blet%20n%3D%7BthreadStartTime%3Athis.startThreadTime%2CexecutionStartMs%3Athis.executionStartMs%2CspeedMultiplier%3Athis.speedMultiplier%2CbaselineThreadTime%3Athis.baselineThreadTime%3F%3Fvoid%200%7D%2Cr%3Dthis.timeline.getCurrentThreadTime(n%2CD !0))%7DtogglePause()%7Bthis.playbackState%3D%3D%3D%22PAUSED%22%3Fthis.resume()%3Athis.pause()%7DupdateStatusOverlay(e%3D!1)%7Bthis.statusOverlay.updateState(this.currentThreadTime%2Cthis.speedMultiplier%2Cthis.playbackState%3D%3D%3D%22PAUSED%22)%2Ce%26%26this.statusOverlay.showTemporarily()%7DgetLastResponseTimestamp()%7Bif(this.responses.length%3D%3D%3D0)return%20null%3Blet%20e%3Dthis.responses%5B0%5D.timestamp%3Bfor(let%20t%20of%20this.responses)t.timestamp.getTime()%3Ee.getTime()%26%26(e%3Dt.timestamp)%3Breturn%20e%7DappendResponses(e)%7Bif(e.length%3D%3D%3D0)return%3Bthis.responses.push(...e)%3Blet%20t%3De.map(n%3D%3E(%7Btimestamp%3An.timestamp%2Cindex%3An.index%7D))%3Bthis.timelineResponses.push(...t)%3Bfor(let%20n%20of%20e)this.responseMap.set(n.index%2Cn)%3Bthis.lastResponseTimestamp%3Dthis.getLastResponseTimestamp()%7D%7D%3Bvar%20S%3Dclass%20extends%20Error%7B%7D%3Basync%20function%20se()%7Blet%20s%3Dnew%20D%2Ce%3Dnew%20_%2Ct%3Dnull%2Cn%3Dnull%3Btry%7Bn%3Dnew%20I(%7BintervalMs%3A1e4%2ConResponsesAdded%3Ao%3D%3E%7Bt%26%26t.appendResponses(o)%7D%2ConError%3Ao%3D%3E%7Bconsole.error(%22%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%E3%82%A8%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BC%3A%22%2Co)%7D%7D)%2Cn.start()%3Blet%20r%3Dn.getCurrentResponses()%3Bif(r.length%3D%3D%3D0)throw%20n.stop()%2Cnew%20S(%22%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%E3%81%8C%E8%A6%8B%E3%81%A4%E3%81%8B%E3%82%8A%E3%81%BE%E3%81%9B%E3%82%93%E3%81%A7%E3%81%97%E3%81%9F%E3%80%82%22)%3Blet%20i%3Dawait%20s.prompt(()%3D%3En%3Fn.getCurrentResponses().length%3Ar.length)%3Bfor(%3Bi%3B)%7Blet%20o%3Dn.getCurrentResponses()%3Bif(i.additionalThreadUrls.length%3E0)try%7Bo%3Dawait%20K(i.additionalThreadUrls%2Ce%2Cn)%7Dcatch(d)%7Bn.stop()%3Blet%20m%3Dd%20instanceof%20Error%3Fd.message%3A%22%E3%82%B9%E3%83%AC%E3%83%83%E3%83%89%E3%81%AE%E5%8F%96%E5%BE%97%E3%81%AB%E5%A4%B1%E6%95%97%E3%81%97%E3%81%BE%E3%81%97%E3%81%9F%E3%80%82%22%3Bthrow%20new%20S(m)%7Dif(o.length%3D%3D%3D0)throw%20n.stop()%2Cnew%20S(%22%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%E3%81%8C%E8%A6%8B%E3%81%A4%E3%81%8B%E3%82%8A%
